{"id":625514497,"lang":"java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1642883149,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/625514497/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"39.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxPower(String s) {\n        int max = 1, curr = 1;\n        if (s == null || s.length() == 0) return max;\n        \n        char prev = s.charAt(0);\n        for (int i = 1; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (s.charAt(i) == prev) {\n                curr++;\n                max = Math.max(max, curr);\n            } else {\n                curr = 1;\n                prev = s.charAt(i);\n            }\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
